release_notes:
Version 1.3.0 - Auto-Save & Multi-Computer GitHub Sync

 Major New Features:

 Auto-Save with Idle Detection
- Automatically saves every 3 minutes when idle for 30 seconds
- Real-time save status in UI
- Never lose your work again!

 GitHub Sync for Multi-Computer Collaboration
- Use GitHub as cloud storage
- Work on multiple computers seamlessly
- Perfect for morning/afternoon computer switches

 Easy Setup Dialog
- Configure sync directly in app
- Secure token management
- Test connection button

 Sync Features:
- Pull/Push to GitHub
- Check remote changes
- Conflict detection
- Auto-pull on start option
